nodes.description: 2018年7月1日，贾拉拉巴德市中心发生自杀式爆炸袭击，造成20人死亡、20人受伤，主要受害者为锡克教徒和印度教徒
nodes.support_text: On 1 July 2018, a suicide bomber detonated in the center of the eastern Afghan city of Jalalabad, killing 20 people, mainly Sikhs and Hindus, and injuring 20 others.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国组织宣称对此次爆炸袭击负责，指控其针对阿富汗特种部队
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State group claimed responsibility for the attack, saying it targeted Afghan Special Forces.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰国在后续声明中声称在贾拉拉巴德开展军事行动，导致60名阿富汗士兵和'多神教徒'伤亡
nodes.support_text: In a further statement they said that 60 Afghan soldiers and 'polytheists' were killed and wounded in an operation in the city of Jalalabad.

edges.support_text: The Islamic State group claimed responsibility for the attack, saying it targeted Afghan Special Forces.
爆炸导致20名其他人受伤后，伊斯兰国声称在贾拉拉巴德开展军事行动，导致60名阿富汗士兵和'多神教徒'伤亡
In a further statement they said that 60 Afghan soldiers and 'polytheists' were killed and wounded in an operation in the city of Jalalabad.
